biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class LessCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.LessCompiler

  • public class LessCompiler
extends Object

    Less compiler compatible with Less 1.7.5.

    How to use: 

     // create compiler and source file
 LessCompiler compiler = new LessCompiler();

 // compile source code
 String cssCode1 = compiler.compile(".basic { display: block; }");
 
 // compile source file
 String cssCode2 = compiler.compile(new File("/source.less"));
 
 // compile source file and save CSS code in an output file
 compiler.compile(new File("/source.less"), new File("/output.css"));
 
 // compile source file and compress CSS code
 String compressedCssCode = compiler.compileAndCompress(new File("/source.less"));
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • compile

        public String compile(CharSequence source)
        Compiles a Less source code to a CSS code.
        Parameters:
        source - the Less code (cannot be null).
        Returns:
        the CSS code.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the Less code is null.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • compile

        public String compile(File source)
        Compiles a Less source file to a CSS code.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file (cannot be null and must exist).
        Returns:
        the CSS code.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the source file is null or does not exist.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if the compiler cannot read source file or any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • compileWithFullInlineSourceMap

        public String compileWithFullInlineSourceMap(File source)
        Compiles a Less source file to a CSS code with full inline Source Map. Full means that include the compiler will include all of the Less files in to the Source Map.
        Parameters:
        source - the source file (cannot be null and must exist).
        Returns:
        the CSS code with inline Source Map.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the source file is null or does not exist.
        InitializationException - if an error occurred during compiler initialization.
        ConfigurationException - if the compiler is configured incorrectly.
        ReadFileException - if the compiler cannot read source file or any @import operation point to non-existent file.
        SyntaxException - if a syntax error occurred during source file compilation.
        CompilerException - if an other error occurred during execution.
        Since:
        2.0.0
